One of Bengal’s finest visual artists, Sanatan Dinda recreates Vincent Van Gogh’s The Starry Night for a #DurgaPuja pandal this year. The art brings together aesthetics of The Starry Night and Rabindranath Tagore’s Aakash Bhora Surjo Tara.
The grand rally organised by the Mamata Banerjee-led West Bengal administration to thank #UNESCO for giving #DurgaPuja the heritage tag has drawn a pat on the back from the world agency.
